about.text: Interested in a maximum dirt after-work-ride, a no-pain-no-gain enduro tour or a relaxed day trip in the tri-state area of Austria, Italy and Slovenia with an officially-certified mountain bike guide? We offer individual tours for beginners and the more advanced near Lake Faak / Villach. Reach out to us and join us discovering Carinthia (KÃ¤rnten) and the broader area of Lake Faak (Faaker See).
about.img: Mountainbiker on the top of Schwarzkogel nearby to Lake Faak.

certification.text: Officially-certified and licensed mountain bike guides from Carinthia

region.title: Experience Carinthia, enjoy Lake Faak
region.text: For us, mountain biking is more than just exercise, it is an attitude to life! This unique lifestyle combines endurance, focus, friendship, emotions, culture, and even regional cuisine with the urge to explore nature and to enjoy a breathtaking countryside. Sounds interesting? Join us and discover a lifestyle of flow and heartbeat in the astonishing region of Lake Faak!
region.img: Mountainbiker sitting on a wonderful alp.

einstein.text: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving."
einstein.author: Albert Einstein

eventTypes.TechniqueTraining: In our technique training sessions we mainly work on your biking skills. Basic hints on your riding position, braking technique and cornering will help you to keep the flow on every trail, and achieve your ideal setup for off-road riding. Afterwards you can demonstrate your abilities on one of the various exciting trails the beautiful Lake Faak area offers.
eventTypes.GuidedTour: Whether you are interested in a maximum dirt after-work-ride, a no-pain-no-gain enduro tour or a relaxed day trip. We offer all kinds of individual tours in the tri-state area of Austria, Italy and Slovenia. Just send us your inquiry and enjoy your unique experience in the epic scenery of Lake Faak.

upcoming.title: Events
upcoming.empty: We're sorry, there are currently no upcoming events.
upcoming.youthDiscountInfo: (*) Young people unter the age of 18.
upcoming.erlebnisCardInfo: (**) Only free with Erlebnis Card. Tickets without Erlebnis Card are only available at our tourist offices and cost 15 EUR. For more information about the Erlebnis Card visit: https://www.region-villach.at/en/offers/region-villach-card-2505115.html
upcoming.furtherInfo: For more information or individual tours please send us your inquiry.

alpbrosQuote.text: "For us, mountain biking is more than just exercise, it is an attitude to life!"
alpbrosQuote.author: Alpbrothers

alpbrosQuote2.text:
"Mountain biking in Carinthia is unique.
Discover a lifestyle of flow and heartbeat in the astonishing region of Lake Faak!"
